item.title: Wir suchen Video Content Creator/UGC Content Creator - Upwork
item.description:
Für unsere Social Media Management Agentur ,,Hallo Social Media'' suchen wir deutschprachige Video Content Creator/UGC Content Creator, die für uns Video-Reviews erstellen können. Das Video muss nicht bearbeitet oder geschnitten werden; es soll in einem Durchgang aufgenommen werden und zwischen 40-80 Sekunden lang sein.

In dem Video soll die Erfahrung mit unserer Diensleistung geteilt werden. Aus Kundensicht sozusagen.



Budget: $40
Posted On: June 29, 2024 12:21 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:German
Skills: German
Country: Germany
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor needed to make YouTube videos from existing script (match footage to script) - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for someone with experience in making UGC content. I will be providing the script and voiceover, and need someone to pull relevant footage related to the script. Some of the video footage can be provided, but you will need to find additional footage.

Please share some samples of YouTube channels you are currently working on & UGC videos

The topic of the channel will be obscure Wikipedia articles. The first video will be regarding the death of Mussolini. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Benito_Mussolini#Death
Some footage can be found on the wikipedia, however you will need to source more footage, and match the script to the video

Please only apply if you have experience making UGC content, and are not an agency.

If you have read the entire post, please start your proposal with: "I am not an agency"

* I will hire 3-4 freelancers to create a 1 minute sample video and based on that will chose who to hire for the channel * IF successful, this could become a long term relationship.

Hourly Range: $4.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 29, 2024 12:07 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Social Media Marketing, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Data Entry, YouTube Marketing
Skills: Social Media Marketing, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Data Entry, YouTube Marketing
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Video producer to create interesting compilation videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a video producer who can take pictures, Instagram stories, and videos and turn them into short video compilations that tell a story.

For example, I traveled to a wedding in India and need a cool compilation video. I also just traveled to San Francisco and need a 1-minute video about that.

I travel a lot, so I'm looking for someone who can help me with this on a long-term basis.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 29, 2024 11:51 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Production, Video Editing, Photo Slideshow, Videography
Skills: Video Production, Video Editing, Photo Slideshow, Videography
Country: United States

item.title: Create promos, edit, and create Reels and content? - Upwork
item.description:
I own a martial arts dojo and I’m looking to have short 10 second - 30 second videos and reels created with themes to attract and influence my audience.

This person will need to be an expert at creating content that touches the six basic humans needs: certainly, variety, significance, connection/love, growth, and contribution.

Being able to touch or connect to someone’s emotion is very important to us.

Budget: $100

Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production

item.title: 🎥 Direct Response UGC Video Editor for long term contract - Upwork
item.description:
We are an ecommerce business looking for a talented video editor to create short, engaging UGC (User-Generated Content) direct response videos.

Project Details:
• Objective: Create short UGC direct response videos for our product.
• Video Requirements: 3 different angles, 3 different pain points, 3 videos in total.

Responsibilities:
• Edit and produce high-quality short videos using existing social media content.
• Create engaging and persuasive content that resonates with our target audience.

Qualifications:

• Proven experience in video editing, especially for direct response or ecommerce.
• Ability to create high-converting videos.
• Familiarity with UGC content and social media trends.

How to Apply:

Submit your portfolio and a brief cover letter. Shortlisted candidates will be hired for a paid test project. The editor with the best performing video will be offered a long-term contract.

Thank you
Charaf

Hourly Range: $20.00-$35.00
Posted On: June 29, 2024 11:36 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Commercial, Social Media Video, Short Video Ad, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, English, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Commercial, Social Media Video, Short Video Ad, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, English, Adobe After Effects
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Hiring A YouTube Thumbnail Designer ($80+ per month) - Upwork
item.description:
Hello! We are hiring a Thumbnail creator for our YouTube Channel. This job will require you to do the following:

-  Create An Engaging Thumbnail For Our Videos  

-  Create 2 Thumbnails Per Week

-  Be able to replicate the quality of thumbnails from the examples below

Please check out some of the videos on these channels to verify you can match the quality of the Thumbnails we are looking for before applying for this job.

https://www.youtube.com/@recapaddict1512/videos

We are paying $10+ per Thumbnail for this job, so we are looking for a well-seasoned Thumbnail Designer who has experience with making these styles of Thumbnails. We are looking to hire someone who can make consistent Thumbnails per month for our channel. if you have read through this entire job post please begin your cover letter with the word "purple". All other applicants will be excluded.

Budget: $10
Posted On: June 29, 2024 11:11 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Adobe Photoshop, Graphic Design, Social Media Imagery, Photo Editing, Adobe Illustrator
Skills: Adobe Photoshop, Graphic Design, Social Media Imagery, Photo Editing, Adobe Illustrator
Country: United States
click to apply
